member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.AcquireCompleted
member.summary: Возникает в момент окончания сканирования. Occurs when the acquire is completed.

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.AcquireError
member.summary: Возникает в момент получения ошибки в процессе сканирования. Occurs when error received during acquire.

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.EndXfer
member.summary: Возникает в момент окончания получения изображения приложением. Occurs when the transfer into application was completed (Native Mode Transfer).

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.XferDone
member.summary: Возникает в момент окончания получения изображения источником.

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.SetupMemXferEvent
member.summary: Возникает в момент установки размера буфера памяти. Occurs when determined size of buffer to use during the transfer (Memory Mode Transfer and MemFile Mode Transfer).

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.MemXferEvent
member.summary: Возникает в момент получения очередного блока данных. Occurs when the memory block for the data was recived (Memory Mode Transfer and MemFile Mode Transfer).

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.SetupFileXferEvent
member.summary: Возникает в момент, когда необходимо задать имя файла изображения. Occurs when you need to specify the filename (File Mode Transfer).

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.FileXferEvent
member.summary: Возникает в момент окончания получения файла изображения приложением. Occurs when the transfer into application was completed (File Mode Transfer).

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.TwainStateChanged
member.summary: Возникает в момент изменения состояния twain-устройства. Occurs when TWAIN state was changed.

member.name: E:Saraff.Twain.Twain32.DeviceEvent
member.summary: Возникает в момент, когда источник уведомляет приложение о произошедшем событии. Occurs when enabled the source sends this message to the Application to alert it that some event has taken place.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.Tiff.TiffDirEntry
member.summary: TIFF Image File Directories are comprised of a table of field descriptors of the form shown below. The table is sorted in ascending order by tag. The values associated with each entry are disjoint and may appear anywhere in the file (so long as they are placed on a word boundary). If the value is 4 bytes or less, then it is placed in the offset field to save space. If the value is less than 4 bytes, it is left-justified in the offset field.

member.summary: Number of items; length in spec.

member.remarks: RATIONALs are the ratio of two 32-bit integer values.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCompression.Lzw
member.summary: Must license from Unisys and IBM to use

member.name: M:Saraff.Twain.TwFix32.ToFloat
member.summary: Приводит тип к числу с плавающей запятой.

member.name: M:Saraff.Twain.TwFix32.op_Implicit(System.Single)~Saraff.Twain.TwFix32
member.summary: Создает экземпляр TwFix32 из числа с плавающей точкой.

member.name: M:Saraff.Twain.TwFix32.op_Explicit(System.UInt32)~Saraff.Twain.TwFix32
member.summary: Создает экземпляр TwFix32 из целого числа.

member.name: M:Saraff.Twain.TwFix32.op_Implicit(Saraff.Twain.TwFix32)~System.Single
member.summary: Приводит тип к числу с плавающей запятой.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwFrame
member.summary: Defines a frame rectangle in ICAP_UNITS coordinates.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwFrame.Left
member.summary: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the left edge.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwFrame.Top
member.summary: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the top edge.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwFrame.Right
member.summary: Gets or sets the x-coordinate that is the sum of TwFrame.Left and width of image.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwFrame.Bottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the y-coordinate that is the sum of TwFrame.Top and length of image.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwIdentity.Id
member.summary: Unique number. In Windows, application hWnd.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwIdentity.ProtocolMajor
member.summary: Application and DS must set to TWON_PROTOCOLMAJOR

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwIdentity.ProtocolMinor
member.summary: Application and DS must set to TWON_PROTOCOLMINOR

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwIdentity.SupportedGroups
member.summary: Bit field OR combination of DG_ constants

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwVersion
member.summary: Describes version of software currently running.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwVersion.MajorNum
member.summary: Major revision number of the software.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwVersion.MinorNum
member.summary: Incremental revision number of the software.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwUserInterface
member.summary: Coordinates UI between application and data source.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwUserInterface.ShowUI
member.summary: TRUE if DS should bring up its UI

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwUserInterface.ModalUI
member.summary: For Mac only - true if the DS's UI is modal

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwUserInterface.ParentHand
member.summary: For windows only - Application window handle

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwStatus
member.summary: Application gets detailed status info from a data source with this.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwEvent
member.summary: For passing events down from the application to the DS.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEvent.Message
member.summary: TwMSG from data source, e.g. TwMSG.XFerReady

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo
member.summary: Application gets detailed image info from DS with this.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.ImageWidth
member.summary: Columns in the image, -1 if unknown by DS

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.ImageLength
member.summary: Rows in the image, -1 if unknown by DS

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.SamplesPerPixel
member.summary: Number of samples per pixel, 3 for RGB

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.BitsPerSample
member.summary: Number of bits for each sample

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Number of bits for each padded pixel

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.Planar
member.summary: True if Planar, False if chunky

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageInfo.PixelType
member.summary: How to interp data; photo interp

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwInfo
member.summary: This structure is used to pass specific information between the data source and the application.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwInfo.NumItems
member.summary: Number of items for this field.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwInfo.ReturnCode
member.summary: This is the return code of availability of data for extended image attribute requested.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwInfo.Item
member.summary: Contains either data or a handle to data.

member.name: P:Saraff.Twain.TwInfo._IsValue
member.summary: Возвращает true, если значение элемента является дескриптором неуправляемой памяти; иначе, false.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwExtImageInfo
member.summary: This structure is used to pass extended image information from the Data Source to the Application at the end of State 7.

member.name: M:Saraff.Twain.TwExtImageInfo.ToPtr(Saraff.Twain.TwInfo[])
member.summary: Выполняет преображование в неуправляемый блок памяти.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwImageLayout
member.summary: Provides image layout information in current units.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwPendingXfers
member.summary: Used with TwMSG.EndXfer to indicate additional data.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwCapability

member.summary: Id of capability to set or get, e.g. TwCap.Brightness

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwCapability.Handle
member.summary: Handle to container of type Dat

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwEnumeration
member.summary: Container for a collection of values.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwRange
member.summary: Container for a range of values.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwSetupMemXfer
member.summary: Sets up DS to application data transfer via a memory buffer.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwImageMemXfer
member.summary: Used to pass image data (e.g. in strips) from DS to application.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageMemXfer.BytesPerRow
member.summary: Number of bytes in a row of data.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageMemXfer.XOffset
member.summary: How far from the side of the image.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageMemXfer.YOffset
member.summary: How far from the top of the image.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageMemXfer.BytesWritten
member.summary: How many bytes written in Memory.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwImageMemXfer.Memory
member.summary: Mem struct used to pass actual image data.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwMemory.Flags
member.summary: Any combination of the TWMF_ constants.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwMemory.Length
member.summary: Number of bytes stored in buffer TheMem.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwMemory.TheMem
member.summary: Pointer or handle to the allocated memory buffer.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwSetupFileXfer
member.summary: Sets up DS to application data transfer via a file.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.TwPalette8
member.summary: DAT_PALETTE8. Color palette when TWPT_PALETTE pixels xfer'd in mem buf.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwPalette8.NumColors
member.summary: Number of colors in the color table.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwPalette8.Colors
member.summary: Array of palette values starts here.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwElement8.Index
member.summary: Value used to index into the color table.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwDeviceEvent.DeviceName
member.summary: The name of the device that generated the event.

member.name: T:Saraff.Twain.__TwEnumeration
member.summary: Container for a collection of values.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEntryPoint.Size
member.summary: Size of the structure in bytes. The application must set this before calling MSG_GET. The Source should examine this when processing a MSG_SET.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEntryPoint.DSM_Entry
member.summary: A pointer to the DSM_Entry function. TWAIN 2.0 Sources must use this value instead of getting it themselves.

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEntryPoint.MemoryAllocate
member.summary: A pointer to the memory allocation function, taking the form TW_HANDLE PASCAL DSM_MemAllocate (TW_UINT32).

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEntryPoint.MemoryFree
member.summary: A pointer to the memory free function, taking the form void PASCAL DSM_MemAllocate (TW_HANDLE).

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEntryPoint.MemoryLock
member.summary: A pointer to the memory lock function, taking the form TW_MEMREF PASCAL DSM_MemAllocate (TW_HANDLE).

member.name: F:Saraff.Twain.TwEntryPoint.MemoryUnlock
member.summary: A pointer to the memory unlock function, taking the form void PASCAL DSM_MemUnlock (TW_HANDLE).
